item.title: Coding a Simple Wordpress Version Scanner In Metasploit
item.description: Hey Folks, Check out my Simplest Script for Finding the Wordpress Version in Metasploit. This module is intended only to show that how we can code a metasploit module. however, tons of tools out there may work 100 times better than this script. This Module Requires you to set RHOSTS to the Server IP and username of the website as USER. Suppose, a website is running wordpress, ping the website and grab the IP, open the website and browse to find the username at /wp-includes/admin-bar.
